title: Large-Scale Civil Servant Teacher Job Competency Development: Applying Elementary Science Education in the Field

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories and elementary teaching experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, providing continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a customized scientific inquiry activity design process to strengthen their learner development competencies within four weeks.
Through team-based project execution, learners improve collaboration and service mindset (publicness) competencies by over 20%.
Based on real classroom case analysis, learners acquire at least three learning design and class management techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
